title: 96/95/EC: Commission Decision of 12 January 1996 authorizing Sweden to maintain its national measures as regards transmissible gastroenteritis in application of Article 10 (4) of Council Directive 64/432/EEC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 January 1996 authorizing Sweden to maintain its national measures as regards transmissible gastroenteritis in application of Article 10 (4) of Council Directive 64/432/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (96/95/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Sweden is authorized to maintain its national measures relating to transmissible gastroenteritis until 31 December 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 January 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 16.
